name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】SUPER SPECIAL SUMMER BIRTHDAY LIVE! #KiaraBDay2025 [f-UbyQUUykE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section on stage with Takanashi Kiara, Juufuutei Raden, and Ichijou Ririka after performing 'Feeling Gradation'. They chat about the performance, take a screenshot together, and Kiara announces she is moving to the center stage for the next guest.
Performance of the song 'Dia' by Takanashi Kiara and Hoshimachi Suisei.

subtitles.original: はーい、儒烏風亭らでん、フロムホロライブデバイス、ReGLOSS！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Hi, I'm Juufuutei Raden from hololive DEV_IS, ReGLOSS! Yay!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ペラペラ、ペラペラ、ペラペラ
subtitles.english: Pera pera, pera pera, pera pera

subtitles.original: Okay, everyone, we danced your song together! Yay!
subtitles.english: Okay, everyone, we danced your song together! Yay!

subtitles.original: Thank you! Oh, thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you! Oh, thank you!

subtitles.original: I'm so happy! Feeling Gradation!
subtitles.english: I'm so happy! Feeling Gradation!

subtitles.original: Awesome! I- I felt- I'm feeling very happy
subtitles.english: Awesome! I- I felt- I'm feeling very happy

subtitles.original: to be able to dance this song 'cause it's so cool! めっちゃかっこいい曲！
subtitles.english: to be able to dance this song 'cause it's so cool! It's such a cool song!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: But how was it to dance with, like, a non-ReGLOSS member?
subtitles.english: But how was it to dance with, like, a non-ReGLOSS member?

subtitles.original: It's actually first time to dance together,
subtitles.english: It's actually first time to dance together,

subtitles.original: who is not ReGLOSS member, so I was a little bit nervous, but...
subtitles.english: who is not ReGLOSS member, so I was a little bit nervous, but...

subtitles.original: Finally, we can do it! Yay! Heart-warming!
subtitles.english: Finally, we can do it! Yay! Heart-warming!

subtitles.original: I think, you know, I chose the white version
subtitles.english: I think, you know, I chose the white version

subtitles.original: of this outfit because I thought we'd look so good together.
subtitles.english: of this outfit because I thought we'd look so good together.

subtitles.original: Suits on you! Yay!
subtitles.english: Suits on you! Yay!

subtitles.original: So, because we look so good together, let's take a cute picture, okay?
subtitles.english: So, because we look so good together, let's take a cute picture, okay?

subtitles.original: Okay! Okay! Yay!
subtitles.english: Okay! Okay! Yay!

subtitles.original: Strike a pose!
subtitles.english: Strike a pose!

subtitles.original: Wait, I- I will go like here.
subtitles.english: Wait, I- I will go like here.

subtitles.original: No, closer, closer, closer, closer! Okay!
subtitles.english: No, closer, closer, closer, closer! Okay!

subtitles.original: ニャア！
subtitles.english: Nyaa!

subtitles.original: Yay! Screenshot! Screenshot!
subtitles.english: Yay! Screenshot! Screenshot!

subtitles.original: Feeling Gradation!
subtitles.english: Feeling Gradation!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Okay! Yay! Woo!
subtitles.english: Okay! Yay! Woo!

subtitles.original: Thank you, thank you! I had so much fun! Dankeschön!
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you! I had so much fun! Dankeschön!

subtitles.original: Me too! Dankeschön! Super danke! Super danke! Dankeschön!
subtitles.english: Me too! Dankeschön! Super danke! Super danke! Dankeschön!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、えー、Feeling Gradationを、ReGLOSSのこの可愛いお二人と一緒に踊りましたけども...
subtitles.english: So, we just danced "Feeling Gradation" with these two cute girls from ReGLOSS, but...

subtitles.original: I have even more guests coming! And even more songs coming!
subtitles.english: I have even more guests coming! And even more songs coming!

subtitles.original: And for that, I will go to the center stage.
subtitles.english: And for that, I will go to the center stage.

subtitles.original: おー、先輩カッコいい！ オッケー！ またねー！
subtitles.english: Oh, Senpai is so cool! Okay! See you!

subtitles.original: バイバイ！ スーパーダンケ！ スーパーダンケ！
subtitles.english: Bye bye! Super danke! Super danke!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ、頑張れー！
subtitles.english: Good luck, good luck!

subtitles.original: 帰ろー。ンデランダランダランダラン...
subtitles.english: Let's go home. Nderan daran daran daran...

subtitles.original: デア・エア・デア・エア　孤独待ち合って
subtitles.english: De-A-E-A, De-A-E-A, waiting for each other in solitude

subtitles.original: 祝えば宴　大胆な幕開け
subtitles.english: If we celebrate, it's a banquet, a bold beginning

subtitles.original: つまらない　下らない　なら　Death, death, death
subtitles.english: If it's boring or trivial, then Death, death, death

subtitles.original: ありきたりな毎日　ちょっと抜け出し　ハイ！
subtitles.english: Breaking away a bit from the ordinary everyday, hi!

subtitles.original: 欲してんのは最新型の上々
subtitles.english: What I want is the latest superb state

subtitles.original: そんでもって無限永久の頂上
subtitles.english: And then, the infinite and eternal peak

subtitles.original: ちょっと待ってちょっとジャン　今行けるだろう？
subtitles.english: Wait a second, wait a bit, we can go now, right?

subtitles.original: 愛してバースデイ
subtitles.english: Love me, it's my birthday

subtitles.original: ドゥワッパー　ときめきにネバーギブアップ
subtitles.english: Du-whappa, never give up on the excitement

subtitles.original: 連れ出して　連れ出して　その歌で
subtitles.english: Take me out, take me out with that song

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデイ
subtitles.english: Happy birthday

subtitles.original: そんなんな　僕らが出会えば
subtitles.english: If we meet like that

subtitles.original: 特別映えるワンシーン
subtitles.english: A particularly standout scene

subtitles.original: 目出度い祝いへ
subtitles.english: To the joyous celebration

subtitles.original: 解けたアシュレース　皆押して
subtitles.english: Untied shoelaces, everyone push forward

subtitles.original: 未知なき未知へ　永久不白 Never never
subtitles.english: To the pathless unknown, eternally unpainted, Never never

subtitles.original: なるようになっていく魔法が公開中
subtitles.english: The magic of things turning out as they should is being revealed

subtitles.original: 不敗だも　自己流　踊り出す宇宙
subtitles.english: Even if undefeated, it's my own style, the universe starts dancing

subtitles.original: 掛けてるどこか　ボルテージ
subtitles.english: A voltage missing somewhere

subtitles.original: オーナナ　涙お見通しだ
subtitles.english: Oh-na-na, I see right through the tears

subtitles.original: その分だけ星になれ　煌めいて
subtitles.english: Become stars for that amount, and sparkle

subtitles.original: ドゥワッパー　胸騒ぎが震えて
subtitles.english: Du-whappa, the unease is trembling

subtitles.original: あの日にかけた魔法が　今だ解けない
subtitles.english: The magic cast that day still hasn't worn off

subtitles.original: 愛してバースデイ
subtitles.english: Love me, it's my birthday

subtitles.original: 一息超えた　夢の踊り場
subtitles.english: A dream's landing after catching a breath

subtitles.original: 堪えられさ　答えなんかきっと
subtitles.english: I can endure it, for the answer is surely...

subtitles.original: 観点外外　ベイビー
subtitles.english: Out of sight, baby

subtitles.original: 超絶歴史　今の我々
subtitles.english: Superb history, the us of now

subtitles.original: 私の運命　絶景
subtitles.english: My fate is a magnificent view

subtitles.original: ドゥワッパー　僕たちはネバーギブアップ
subtitles.english: Du-whappa, we will never give up

subtitles.original: 踊らせて　踊らせて　その歌で
subtitles.english: Let us dance, let us dance to that song

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデイ
subtitles.english: Happy birthday

subtitles.original: 嗚呼、嗚呼、朝を見つけた
subtitles.english: Ah, ah, I've found the morning

subtitles.original: 瞬き色めく世界へ
subtitles.english: Into a world sparkling in a blink

subtitles.original: 愛してバースデイ　イェイ！
subtitles.english: Love me, it's my birthday, yay!

subtitles.original: 嗚呼...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 今響くこの響きは変わらずに
subtitles.english: This resonance ringing now remains unchanged

subtitles.original: 合図はここから君に通知
subtitles.english: A signal sent to you from here

subtitles.original: 愛してるよ　ずっと　ハッピーバースデイ僕らへ
subtitles.english: I love you, forever, happy birthday to us

subtitles.original: I love you all, lucky us babe
subtitles.english: I love you all, lucky us babe

subtitles.original: 照らして
subtitles.english: Shine on us

subtitles.original: Lucky us babe, 祝おうか
subtitles.english: Lucky us babe, shall we celebrate?

subtitles.original: 手、上げな！
subtitles.english: Put your hands up!

subtitles.original: 愛してバースデイ
subtitles.english: Love me, it's my birthday
